bug.author: haifengkao
bug.description:

"/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/coremltools/converters/mil/mil/builder.py", line 145, in _create_input_vars var = cls._add_const(val, new_var_name, before_op) File "/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/coremltools/converters/mil/mil/builder.py", line 82, in _add_const raise ValueError("Cannot add const {}".format(val)) ValueError: Cannot add const (is3, 1280) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
If a python script can reproduce the error, please paste the code snippet
<denchmark-code>import coremltools import tensorflow.keras as keras
input_shape = (1, 1280) inp = keras.layers.Input(shape=input_shape) h0 = keras.layers.Input(shape=(512,)) c0 = keras.layers.Input(shape=(512,)) out, hn, cn = keras.layers.LSTM(512, return_sequences=True, return_state=True, recurrent_activation='sigmoid')(inp) keras_model = keras.models.Model(inputs=[inp, h0, c0], outputs=[out, hn, cn])
model = coremltools.convert( keras_model)
</denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>System environment (please complete the following information):</denchmark-h>
coremltools version (e.g., 3.0b5): 4.0b1 OS (e.g., MacOS, Linux): MacOS macOS version (if applicable): OSX 10.5.5 XCode version (if applicable): 11.6b How you install python (anaconda, virtualenv, system): anaconda python version (e.g. 3.7): 3.7 any other relevant information: tenserflow 2.2

comments.comment: I have this bug too. Maybe someone knows what to do?
Hi, I have created a ticket for this so that we will be able to track and resolve this issue in the coming releases. Please feel free to add any other details related to this issue in the mean time.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/haifengkao>@haifengkao</denchmark-link> I believe this issue has been fix in coremltools 4.0b4, please give it a try! Thanks!
Please reopen the issue if you still get any problem converting this model :)

I am still facing the same issue with coremltools 4.0 <denchmark-code>Converting Frontend ==> MIL Ops: 0%| | 0/36 [00:00<?, ? ops/s]WARNING:root:Input ls elem type unknown. Override with <class 'coremltools.converters.mil.mil.types.type_tensor.tensor.<locals>.tensor'> Converting Frontend ==> MIL Ops: 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 36/36 [00:00<00:00, 6246.95 ops/s] Converting Frontend ==> MIL Ops: 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 13/13 [00:00<00:00, 46763.25 ops/s] </denchmark-code>
